review.practice_name: Dr. Trivedis Total Woman Health Care Centre

survey_response.review_text:
Dr. Soumil Trivedi has successfully carried out the laproscopy surgery on my wife for removing multiple fibroids. From the first appointment up until discharge, he and his highly professional team provided us with excellent care and exceptional support. His knowledge was way beyond our imagination. The advise he gave was out of the box. 
We would highly recommend him blindly without any second thought.

review.practice_name: Dr. Trivedis Total Woman Health Care Centre

survey_response.review_text:
I was referred to Dr Soumil and Dr. Aditi from one of my closest friend.
I was suffering through severe pain during periods and I’m blessed to meet this doctor couple.
I recently underwent surgery for removal of uterus by Laparoscopy done by Dr. Soumil. Initially I was extremely apprehensive as not had any surgery before but both Dr Aditi and Dr Soumil assured me and took great care of me. When they showed me my surgical video I was shocked to see the gravity of my problem where my bowel was stuck to the uterus . Soumil dr and the team did a great job. From the initial consultation to the post-operative follow-ups, they ensured I felt informed, supported, and well-cared for. The new hospital is so beautiful and aesthetically made and cater to all patient needs with so much compassion. The homely food served made me feel at home. I really enjoyed sipping my evening cup of tea at the attached garden balcony it was like a staycation for me. Thank you to entire Trivedi team for such an exceptional care

review.practice_name: Dr. Trivedis Total Woman Health Care Centre

survey_response.review_text:
I underwent Laparoscopic Myomectomy for my Fibroids at Dr. Trivedi’s Total Health Care.

Had consulted many doctors prior but all were suggesting removal of uterus which I don’t want.

Dr. Prakash Trivedi who consulted me highlighted that only removal of fibroids would be enough to solve my problems. 

Dr. Soumil Trivedi operated for Fibroid Removal and my recovery was very fast & smooth.

Hospital, food, staff is very nice & helpful & ensure your & your relatives comfort at every step. Would definitely recommend them to anyone with gynaec issues ...Thank you for all your help Assistant Dr's and Sonal mam &efforts  in this journey..we decide to take with because of your positive warm and reassuming words and help.

review.practice_name: Dr. Trivedis Total Woman Health Care Centre

survey_response.review_text:
My wife got treated by Dr. Soumil Trivedi. He made us get extremely comfortable and explained the diagnosis, possible interventions with utmost attention to detail in layman terms. Mighty impressed by his calmness and responsiveness.

At every step there was absolute transparency from the consults to the surgery highlighting what could be the potential risks associated with a complex pathology like Endometriosis especially involving the bowel & urine tract but it was handled very meticulously by Dr. Soumil. I know this because I was invited to see some glimpses of the Laparoscopic Surgery in 3D which was quite reassuring for me as an anxious husband to know that all was going on fine & as planned.

He later explained the entire surgical procedure to me & my wife in very simple language which we really appreciated detailing the nature of the problem & the impressive technology used to deal with it.

The best part was my wife barely had any pain post surgery & was discharged in 2 days. 

Would highly recommend Dr. Soumil Trivedi for any Gynaec issues

review.practice_name: Dr. Trivedis Total Woman Health Care Centre

survey_response.review_text:
I cannot thank Dr. Soumil Trivedi & the entire Team of Dr. Trivedi’s Total Health Care enough for the stupendous surgery they have done for my sister.

She had a large 26 cm fibroid which was scary for us & having consulted many doctors who advised such a large fibroid cannot be done laparoscopically Dr. Soumil evaluated her in great detail and said the only concerning factor was that the fibroid had grown by 9cm in a year but otherwise no matter the size Laparoscopic Removal of the Fibroid is possible. Many doctors also said that sometimes uterus may have to be removed but he ensured us that only fibroid will be removed & not the uterus unless there are cancer changes.

The surgery was performed in their New Hospital which I must say is an exceptional private hospital with modern amenities & very clean with really sweet & cordial staff who go above & beyond to ensure comfort.

The surgery was completed laparoscopically as assured by Dr. Soumil & he had arranged a Frozen Section biopsy which turned out to be non cancerous as he had suggested which was a big relief to all of us.

When he showed & explained us how the entire surgery was carried out we were in shock to see how large the fibroid actually was & how efficiently the surgery was handled by him to ensure minimal bleeding & also how they remove such a large fibroid in a bag in strips to remove laparoscopically.

My sister was very comfortable post surgery despite the surgery lasting 4 hrs plus with minimal pain & was up & about the very next day.

My sincerest appreciation for Dr. Soumil Trivedi & his Team at Dr. Trivedi’s Total Health Care for the fantastic experience. Any body with any Gynaec issues you must meet Dr. Soumil once. Highly skilled surgeon & a very humble human being !! Thank you so very much 😊🙏special thanks to Mrs. Priti Trivedi, Dr. PRAKASH Trivedi,  Dr. Aditi Trivedi,  Hemal Sonali and all the sisters who gave us moral support during procedure and aftercare.

review.practice_name: Dr. Trivedis Total Woman Health Care Centre

Food cooked and served from dr 'house which makes it healthy.

review_reply.reply_text: Wow. This is such an elaborate review. Thank you for your kind & detailed feedback. Glad we could be a part of your success story & serve you.

survey_response.review_text:
I believed in God, then I trusted God. I believe Doctors and then I trusted our Doctor. Thankyou Dr. Soumil, Dr. Priti, Dr. Prakash, All assistant doctors and staff of Dr.Trivedi maternity nursing home during all those 730+ days of struggling time to our happiest day that of birth of our baby on 💓 25 June 2020.
Our Journey with Trivedi Nursing home began with an emergency admission of my wife. This was our first miscarriage and reasons we were just guessing. Dr.Prakash and Dr.Soumil  handled our case. We somehow came out of this sadness hoping for positive things that still can happen. Under Doctors advise after 3 months we started medicine course and done some normal tests for next pregnancy. It was found in test report that chances of pregnancy by normal  intercourse were at border. It was advised by Dr. Priti that better we try pregnancy with IUI and IVF as later the fertility rate will come down that then might have to look for doner. We crossed check with few of my company Doctors about the facts. By this time we started believing Doctors at Trivedi Nursing home. We consulted with Dr. Priti and decided this time to go ahead with IUI with still time we have looking at fertility report. Other Doctors could have directly advise to go for ivf this time as IVF is costly than IUI. Our IUI was successful and pregnancy was positive. But our mystery continued and in 6th week we had to face our 2nd miscarriage. This time it was more difficult time for me and my wife to bear this sorrow. During this time we also thought of many things and full of questions like why this thing happened and this miscarriage exactly during same time of 6th week. Even we thought should we change Doctor - we didn't say or make this feel to doctor :) but we were wrong on this thought of ours. This was a turning point when Dr. Soumil handled our case. He did all investigation with our past records and current and helped us understand medical possibilities that could be with our miscarriage. He spend over 30 minutes to help us understand and upfront we got all answers to above questions that we had. He also said that if we really looking to investigate into why this miscarriage then there are more than 52 test that we need to do and cost involved in it. Even doing all this test there are possibility that we still might not find the reason. Further he suggested that there are only 3 test(of this one was historic based on family which was not in our case)that we must do that can help us during our next pregnancy to avoid miscarriage. We now had confidence in our Doctor that we now started to TRUST and came out positively with new ray of hope future. We had undergone hysteroscopy to look if anything internally triggering miscarriage. But  histroscopy didn't had any reasons that we were looking for - it was all fine.

Now back to Dr.Priti who then decided that we must go for IVF as by now we had spend years time. We had our first ivf in June 2019 but this went unsuccessful. We needed to have our 2nd IVF and was asked by Dr.Priti to wait for a month's time. Thereafter we have family emargency took place in August and September 2019 that we had stressful period. We were advised by Dr.Priti that we wait to pass this stressful period and do ivf during normal situations - stress being important part during IUI/ivf and pregnancy. We took her advise and then went for 2nd ivf in October 2019 - This was successful. During our normal Doctor's visit in 3rd week after pregnancy it was noticed by Dr.Priti that my wife's BP was high and she referred to general physician to be consulted. This was one of critical decision in our success story and BP control medicine started. After pregnancy is positive, now the case is back in hands of Dr. Soumil. 

During 6th week my wife had spotting like in periods and we immediately rushed into Dr. Trivedi's hospital. Thankfully immediate treatment by Dr. Priti saved our miscarriage. Next day morning at 8 am Dr. Prakash on his way back from Canada directly visited hospital to see his patient i.e. us. He could have gone home and come back evening for visit as other doctors have attended the case. This concern of his shows how much he cares and values patients.

Every visit from day one till date we had with Dr. Soumil, it was none less than 30 minutes of time that he has given to us - thorough checkup with explaining situations and development in details till you understand it. This time is spend with all patients that he attends.This is very important as a patient, and family member of patient, that your doctor give you enough time and you start trusting - VALUE.

In pregnancy week of 31st, my wife was admitted for evaluation of risk due to continuously high BP. This was time of Covid19 where Mumbai was highly impacted.  Nursing and service staff at Trivedi's were continuously working in a slot  of 10-15 days and stay there itself, avoiding risk of traveling, thereby taking precautions against covid19. Only emergency cases that are absolutely needed for hospitalization were taken in. We came to know hospital was offered to convert to covid hospital, obviously as source of high income. But Dr. Prakash with all care to his patients and been speciality in maternity denied this offer - This is great, Thankyou Dr. Prakash for this wonderful decision. This makes patients like us still believe that there are Doctors who primarily work for healthcare and not to make more revenue.

Finally an emotional day arrived on 25 June 2020 when we were about to have our baby. We were excited and tensed. Whatever we were going to have whether a baby boy or baby girl, it was going to make us father and mother. We finally got a baby boy on the day which was cherishable day in our life. We really thank whole heartedly 💓 again to Dr. Priti, Dr. Soumil, Dr. Prakash, Dr. Aditi, all assistant doctors, sisters and maushis for right consultation, treatment, guidance and serving us in journey for having wonderful healthy baby.

Sharing our success story so that it might be a help for other people.
                                                       -  Harshada & Prashant

review_reply.reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words. Wishing you the best health

survey_response.review_text:
Recently I got operated at Dr. Trivedi’s Total Health Care for Multiple Fibroids for which I was advised Laparoscopic Hysterectomy.

We have been consulting Dr. Aditi Trivedi who explained us the intricacies of the issues I was having after a thorough sonography and we got operated by Dr. Soumil Trivedi.

I had a large uterus almost the size of 5 months pregnancy due to multiple fibroids & had researched exhaustively about various options & found this Hospital sharing all the latest information & options in all honesty & transparency.

I was very anxious prior to surgery but Dr. Aditi instilled confidence in me reassuring me at every step & the surgery was scratchless. Dr. Soumil showed us the surgery & explained us in detail how technology has evolved now with 3D laparoscopy & literally there was not even 2 drops of bleeding in the entire surgery for such a large uterus which had nearly 10-12 large fibroids & almost total 25-30 fibroids including small ones. The uterus was removed in strips in a bag which adds to the safety which I had read when I had researched prior to the surgery.

The hospital has a lovely ambience & all the administrative & nursing staff are very caring with delicious home food provided to the patient & the relative.

Really pleasant experience & the recovery has been very quick as assured by Dr. Aditi & finely executed by Dr. Soumil. I would also like to mention that Ms Sonali Nikam helped us alot with the mediclaim process and both the doctors are very friendly and approachable. I would like to recommend anyone facing any gynaecological problems to visit the clinic. 

Great Team Work Dr. Trivedi’s Total Health Care

review.practice_name: Dr. Trivedis Total Woman Health Care Centre

review_reply.reply_text: Thank you so much. Wishing all 3 of you the best health ☺️

survey_response.review_text: I would like to thank the entire team at Dr Trivedi hospital especially Dr Soumil and Dr Aditi for taking such good care of me.. It’s all because of them that I’m blessed with a beautiful baby girl. I had many abortions in the past and was so tensed about my pregnancy but they assured me always and it’s due to their best treatment that we have so much of happiness in our lives. Hospital environment feels like home especially tasty home cook food which they serve even to relative it felt so homely and like family..all the sisters and mavshi are extremely caring and sweet and they celebrated also my baby’s birth with cake balloons and gifts for the baby..It was the best delivery experience

survey_response.review_text:
Dr. Trivedi's Total Women Health Care Centre is one of the Best Hospitals for women for any gyneacological problems. 

We had been trying to become parents since long & had consulted many hospitals & doctors regarding the same, but, we always got disappointed. Then one of our relatives gave us reference of Dr. Trivedi's Team which is in Ghatkopar East. We visited them with lots of positive hopes. I & my wife met Dr. Soumil & Dr. Aditi. After going through my wife's history of pregnancy they prescribed her some routine tests & medications.  Dr. Soumil explained us all the parameters in detail. This helped us a lot to understand the entire process, as my wife has history of High-Risk Pregnancy. 

We started consulting with Dr. Soumil. Almost after a year my wife conceived Naturally. Our happiness had no bounds. During her 1st Trimester she was not in Mumbai, she was at her mother's place in Ahmedabad & was not allowed to travel. So, she consulted in a hospital there. Dr. Soumil gave her full support & was always available on call for her. Right from speaking to doctors, regarding any test to be done, explaining in detail results & consequences of the reports (without hiding anything), etc.etc.. This really meant a lot to us. In her 2nd Trimester after doctor's consultation & permission she was allowed to travel & shifted to Mumbai. Then in her entire pregnancy period Dr. Soumil & Dr. Aditi as well as their entire staff took utmost care of her. They were 24*7available for any assistance. Dr. Aditi was always just a call away. 

The Drs. at Dr. Trivedi's Total Women Health Care Centre are highly professionals, knowledgeable & answer all our doubts so patiently & politely. The entire staff at clinic & hospital right from nurses, maushis & specially Ms. Hemal are so friendly, co-operative & supportive. They make us feel as if we are @ Home.  Ms. Hemal was just a call away for any assistance if we were unable to contact doctors. 

This hospital has Best doctors, good trained staff, nurses & receptionists. They take care of all necessary precautions & hygiene in clinic & hospital. The food served to patients & their relatives is absolutely superb (Ekdum Ghar Ka Khana). They don’t have a 5star or 7star look like hospital or ambience & that’s not at all important. Important & BEST thing is that they have all major facilities for patients available in their hospital & clinic. Everything available under One Roof (sonography, blood test, other screenings, all major & latest equipment’s & technology, etc). This becomes very convenient for pregnant ladies & other patients. 

Any gynaecological treatment & consultation is Highly Recommendable at Dr. Trivedi's Total Women Health Care Centre, as because of them only today we are proud parents of a cute baby boy Hitansh {our Ansh}, who is now 9+ months old.

Our special gratitude to Dr. Soumil, Dr. Aditi, Dr. Prakash, Dr. Priti, Ms. Hemal & their entire team. Trivedi's you ROCK :)

survey_response.review_text:
Extremely happy with the services provided by Dr. Soumil Trivedi & his Team.

My wife was having heavy bleeding for which had undergone multiple treatments but not getting solved.

Dr. Soumil evaluated & diagnosed Adenomyosis which is thickening of the wall of the Uterus & explained that it usually responds poorly to medicines.

Unlike many other doctors he does not rush through the appointments and gives you adequate time answering every query that a patient may have.

He suggested removal of the Uterus but since my wife has had 2 cesar delivery also explained that urine bag is sometimes stuck to uterus and that is the only complexity he is anticipating in the surgery which is otherwise very routine.

He also has done similar surgery for relative of mine with 3 cesar with Laparoscopy. So we had the trust factor in him & went ahead for the surgery as suggested.

The surgery went off as planned & my family doctor was also allowed in the OT to watch the surgery in 3D & recovery was very quick as if nothing has happened. He also showed us the entire surgery later explaining how the entire procedure was carried out.

Kudos to Dr. Trivedi’s Total Health Care & Team especially Dr. Soumil Trivedi for excellent services including administration, food, billing & staff for the cordial care.

Dr. Trivedis Total Health Care is one stop solution for all women’s health issues with latest technology & always makes you feel at home

survey_response.review_text:
We visited Dr. Soumil Trivedi for Uterine issues especially heavy bleeding & fibroids. 

He evaluated & explained the minutest detail explaining us the sonography with something called Color Doppler with which he saw the location of various fibroids & also the blood supply. We were convinced at every step because no one has explained us so patiently with so much accurate details and advised to go ahead with 3D Laparoscopic Hysterectomy with Removal of both tubes.

The pre surgery process, coordination of the administrative staff was excellent and the surgery went off very well. As explained by Dr. Soumil my wife was up & about just 4-6 hrs post surgery & was discharged the very next day with almost no pain or discomfort. He only kept saying one thing. Please don’t take too much rest after surgery as otherwise it defeats the purpose of these advanced technologies & listening to him my wife was active almost from day 3 post surgery.

He went out of his way to explain us the entire surgical procedure in details explaining how everything was stuck due to previous surgeries. We were awestruck by his experience & expertise to handle such a complicated case with so much confidence & ease.

The hospital is one of the best private hospitals I have been to with courteous staff with tasty & healthy home food & extremely smooth administrative & accounts department. 

Highly recommend Dr. Soumil Trivedi & his efficient Team for any Gynec Problems
